verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}With one word the enemy scatters In one name our triumph is sure. With one heart the lost shall be rescued Through one body His will shall be done.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Through one church the world shall be ruled And with one voice we shall sound His return. Because one man had made those Who are many as one.{/lang-eng}
